ygData.msgSnippet: Ryo, I didn t let Kinger fix the Ark in a week, so I m not going to let you do it in two posts. It ll have to take more work. ... power. I m ... and ?3 ...

Ryo, I didn't let Kinger fix the Ark in a week, so I'm not going to 
let you do it in two posts. It'll have to take more work.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "RYO D" <striderzero1@h...> wrote:
> ::Void::
> "Shields online in 3 , 2 ,1. Shields are currently running at max 
power. I'm 
> going to start rerouting power.
> 
> ::?4::
> "We got some autoguns and some basic defense around the area me 
and ?3
> will switch off on patrol and repair." Starts helping with internal 
frame 
> repair this time Reinforcing the frame of the ship trying to make 
it 
> stronger.
> 
> ::?1::
> "Alright People this is the midnight run so every second counts."
> Start to connecting the engines and repairing the power core damage.
> 
> ::?2::
> Repairing the damaged main engine and secondary engine. "This is 
not what I 
> expected."
> 
> ::?3::
> Start to mount traps and defense grid weapon, Jamming stations, 
barriers,
> Rocket Launchers, Land Mines, Pit traps,  Quick sandpits, Freeze 
lances, 
> Bombs, Match head missiles, Glue bombs, Poison darts.
> 
> ::?6::
> Working on the controls. "Man this is basic."
> 
> ::?5::
> Starts helping Koj repair the outside hull." We can fix this."
> 
> ::Koj::
> Koj  still attaching plating to the hull trying to make it stronger 
than 
> before. "If I wanted to work hard I've never turned to crime."
> 
> ::Inu::
> Inu uses his bulk to help move the beams and his fire to secure it 
in place. 
> "Come on we are  rebuilding history and our future."
>                    ::ARK REPAIR IN LAYMAN'S TERMS::
> 
>                      
I))                                                     
>           *       1    10    20     30    40    50    60    70    
80    90   
>   Prime!!!
> 
>
